channel.title: Kitty News
channel.description: Everything you wanted to know about my cat Lucky.

item-matt.title: Another Mouse!
item-matt.description: Lucky caught another mouse today! She is quite the mouser.

item-matt.title: A Hard Day in the Armchair
item-matt.description: After yesterday's frenzy of activity, Lucky took it easy today and spent the whole day in the armchair.

item-matt.title: A Mouse for Breakfast
item-matt.description: Clever Lucky caught a big juicy mouse for breakfast this morning. She looks very contented right now.
